title: Podcast Episode 109 – CAUGHT FOR CHRISTMAS by Skye Warren
description:
Our audiobook tease this week is Caught for Christmas by Skye Warren

Fair warning: Contains a sweet, sexy, honorable man who is ruthless when it comes to catching the woman he wants.

I’ll be home for Christmas…

The plan is simple. Break into the club and steal the money I need to save my father. The ex-military bouncer isn’t going to stop me, even if he is hot as hell.

If only in my dreams…

Except he has a curious knack for knowing my next step.

And there’s something dark underneath his desire, something dangerous. If he catches me, he might not let me go.

Caught for Christmas by Skye Warren » https://bit.ly/3mzOjhL
The Diamond Trilogy » https://bit.ly/37zWqqf
More books by Skye Warren: https://bit.ly/3rg6wV9
